body_html:
I faced the same problem when installing pytorch from source.

File "/home/jwan/projects/pytorch/tools/autograd/utils.py", line 13, in <module>
     from yaml import CLoader as YamlLoader
ImportError: cannot import name 'CLoader'

File "/home/jwan/projects/pytorch/tools/autograd/utils.py", line 15, in <module>
     from yaml import YamlLoader
ImportError: cannot import name 'YamlLoader'

You mean the utils.py file is wrong?

body:
I faced the same problem when installing pytorch from source.
```
File "/home/jwan/projects/pytorch/tools/autograd/utils.py", line 13, in <module>
     from yaml import CLoader as YamlLoader
ImportError: cannot import name 'CLoader'

File "/home/jwan/projects/pytorch/tools/autograd/utils.py", line 15, in <module>
     from yaml import YamlLoader
ImportError: cannot import name 'YamlLoader'
```
You mean the utils.py file is wrong?
